title: It makes me sick when i see professional players inting and being x8 times toxic than bronze players
body:
i am not sure what to say .... 
This is really a shame

replies.body: Humans have the capacity of greater evil and greater good for one cannot exist without the other.

And Just think, New players come into the game and think "Well the professional players act this way and look how much they get paid, so It must be ok if -i- act this way too" They look at the pros and try and mimic them, in attitude. 

And Because Riot PUSHES this Esport focus without saying "yeah you CAN be an Esports pro, but acting like a complete and total entitled JACKHOLE is -NOT- a good idea. 

But still, people try and think they can be as vile and hateful as they want.

> "Well the professional players act this way and look how much they get paid, so It must be ok if -i- act this way too"

There really shouldn't be a ton of children(not personality wise; actual children) running around in a game for teens.

Because only kids would think like that.

These are the role models that lower tiers have to live up to and become more like - apparently. :p

Unfortunately some have not learned the difference between simple taunting and the nasty vitriol that occurs in electronic gaming.
Who cares, its just words lol
